Posts.Content: Has anyone been diagnosed with Differentiated Mucinous Collide Carcinoma of the breast? It is quite rate 1-3% diagnosis rate. I am a 62 year old white female scheduled for surgery on August 10, 2009. Packets of literature been provided by the surgical center with graphs and tables which mean absolutely nothing to me. Any information would be most helpful on post-op treatment, pain management, etc. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Differentiated Mucinous Collide Carcinoma
